span.span: An entity type.

summary.span: 表示一个动态实体集合，可在添加、移除项目或刷新列表时提供通知。

span.span: Represents a dynamic entity collection that provides notifications when items get added, removed, or when the list is refreshed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)] 提供 类以支持将数据绑定到客户端应用程序中的控件。provides the class to support binding data to controls in client applications. 此类继承自 类，该类实现 接口，是 WINDOWS PRESENTATION FOUNDATION (WPF) 和基于 Silverlight 的应用程序的主数据绑定机制。This class inherits from the class, which implements the interface and is the primary data binding mechanism for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Silverlight-based applications. 可以通过使用实现了 接口的任何集合来加载 绑定集合。You can load an binding collection by using any collection that implements the interface. 加载到绑定集合中的项必须实现 接口。Items loaded into the binding collection must implement the interface. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [将数据绑定到控件](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Binding Data to Controls](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/binding-data-to-controls-wcf-data-services). ## Examples 下面的示例摘自在 WPF 中定义 `SalesOrders` 窗口的可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 页的代码隐藏页。The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF. 加载窗口时， 会根据查询结果创建，该查询返回具有相关对象的客户，并按国家/地区进行筛选。When the window is loaded, an is created based on the result of a query that returns customers with related objects, filtered by country/region. 此结果绑定到作为 WPF 窗口的根布局控件的 的 属性。This result is bound to the property of the that is the root layout control for the WPF window. [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/cs/customerorderswpf.xaml.cs#wpfdatabinding)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/vb/customerorderswpf.xaml.vb#wpfdatabinding)] 以下 XAML 在 WPF 中为上一个示例定义 `SalesOrders` 窗口。The following is the XAML that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF for the previous example. [!code-xaml[Astoria Northwind Client#WpfDataBindingXaml](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/vb/customerorderswpf.xaml#wpfdatabindingxaml)]

related.span: 将数据绑定到控件（WCF 数据服务）

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，将对 启用自动更改跟踪。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 您可以创建 的实例，该实例在您使用可以为 提供 值的构造函数创建实例时，会使用手动更改跟踪。You can create an instance of that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of for . 使用手动跟踪时，必须实现 和 并处理引发事件，以便将更改手动报告到 。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the . 将项加载到集合中后，将开始自动更改跟踪。Automatic change tracking begins after items are loaded into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函数分别由 和 事件调用。The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the and events, respectively. `entityChanged` 方法使用 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法则使用 值。The `entityChanged` method takes an value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a value. 这两个方法都必须返回指示事件是否由函数进行处理的布尔值。Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function. 当该方法返回时 `true` ，默认行为仍将出现。When the method returns `true`, the default behavior still occurs. 默认情况下，将对 启用自动更改跟踪。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 您可以创建 的实例，该实例在您使用可以为 提供 值的构造函数创建实例时，会使用手动更改跟踪。You can create an instance of that uses manual change tracking when you create an instance using a constructor that enables you to supply a value of for . 使用手动跟踪时，必须实现 和 并处理引发事件，以便将更改手动报告到 。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，将对 启用自动更改跟踪。By default, automatic change tracking is enabled for a . 使用此类构造函数为 提供 `trackingMode` 值，以便创建使用手动更改跟踪的 实例。Use this class constructor to supply a value of for `trackingMode` to create an instance of that uses manual change tracking. 使用手动跟踪时，必须实现 和 并处理引发事件，以便将更改手动报告到 。When you use manual tracking, you must implement and and handle the raise events to manually report changes to the . 当 不是引用了 `items` 实例的 或 时，必须提供 。The must be supplied when `items` is not a or that has a reference to a instance. `entityChanged` 和 `collectionChanged` 函数分别由 和 事件调用。The `entityChanged` and `collectionChanged` functions are invoked by the and events, respectively. `entityChanged` 方法使用 值，而 `collectionChanged` 方法则使用 值。The `entityChanged` method takes an value and the `collectionChanged` method takes a value. 这两个方法都必须返回指示事件是否由函数进行处理的布尔值。Both methods must return a Boolean value that indicates whether the event was handled by the function. 当该方法返回时 `true` ，默认行为仍将出现。When the method returns `true`, the default behavior will still occur.

span.span: Removes all items from the collection, and optionally detaches all the items from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分离某项后，数据图中的所有相关对象也将从 中分离出来。When an item is detached, all related objects in the data graph are also detached from the .

summary.span: 获取用于返回下一分页结果集的延续对象。

span.span: Gets a continuation object that is used to return the next set of paged results.

value.span: 对象，包含用于返回下一分页结果集的 URI。

span.span: A object that contains the URI to return the next set of paged results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据服务中启用分页时， 属性将返回用于访问下一分页结果集的链接。The property returns a link that is used to access the next set of paged results when paging is enabled in the data service. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [配置数据服务](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [Configuring the Data Service](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/configuring-the-data-service-wcf-data-services). 将分页结果加载到 中时，必须通过传递从 属性获取的 URI 的执行结果，调用 的 方法来显式加载各页。When loading a paged result into a , you must explicitly load pages by calling the method on the by passing the result of the execution of the URI that was obtained from the property. ## Examples 下面的示例摘自在 WPF 中定义 `SalesOrders` 窗口的可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 页的代码隐藏页。The following example is from the code-behind page for an Extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) page that defines the `SalesOrders` window in WPF. 加载此窗口时，将根据 返回客户（按国家/地区筛选）的查询结果创建。When the window is loaded, a is created based on the result of a query that returns customers, filtered by country/region. 将加载此分页结果的所有页面和相关订单，并将这些页面绑定到作为 WPF 窗口的根布局控件的 的 属性。All of the pages of this paged result are loaded, along with the related orders, and are bound to the property of the that is the root layout control for the WPF window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：将数据绑定到 Windows Presentation Foundation 元素](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to Windows Presentation Foundation Elements](/dotnet/framework/data/wcf/bind-data-to-wpf-elements-wcf-data-services). [!code-csharp[Astoria Northwind Client#BindPagedData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/cs/customerorderswpf3.xaml.cs#bindpageddata)] [!code-vb[Astoria Northwind Client#BindPagedData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/astoria_northwind_client/vb/customerorderswpf3.xaml.vb#bindpageddata)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Detach() cil managed

summary.span: 禁止 跟踪集合中的所有项。

span.span: Disables tracking of all items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只能在 是根集合时调用。The method can only be called when is the root collection. 在属于根集合的集合上调用 方法时，也将停止对数据图中所有相关对象进行的跟踪。When the method is called on a collection that is a root collection, tracking is also stopped for all related objects in the data graph.

param.name: index
param.span: 要添加项的索引位置。

span.span: Index at which to add the item.

param.name: item
param.span: 要添加的项。

span.span: The item to add.

summary.span: 将指定项添加到集合的指定索引位置。

span.span: Adds a specified item to the collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 手动跟踪对集合所做的更改时，必须重写 方法，防止自动将项添加到集合。When you are manually tracking changes to the collection, you must override the method to prevent items from being automatically added to the collection.

span.span: Loads entities into the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T> items) cil managed
Public Sub Load (items As IEnumerable(Of T))

param.name: items
param.span: 要添加到 的实体对象的集合。

span.span: Collection of entity objects to be added to the .

summary.span: 将实体对象的集合加载到集合中。

span.span: Loads a collection of entity objects into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法时将附加集合中的所有对象（如果这些对象尚未附加到与 关联的 ）。Calling the method attaches all objects in the collection, if they are not already attached to the that is associated with the . 使用 方法附加对象时，还将附加所有相关对象。When an object is attached by using the method, all related objects are also attached.

param.name: item

span.span: Entity object to be added.

summary.span: 将单个实体对象加载到集合中。

span.span: Loads a single entity object into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法时将附加对象（如果该对象尚未附加到与 关联的 ）。Calling the method attaches the object, if it is not already attached to the that is associated with the . 使用 方法附加对象时，还将附加所有相关对象。When an object is attached by using the method, all related objects are also attached.
